scripts.dependency-check: echo 'Checking for unused dependencies...' && npx depcheck --ignores='@types/*,autoprefixer,postcss,tailwindcss,baseline-browser-mapping,jest-environment-jsdom'
scripts.env-check: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const envExists = fs.existsSync('.env.local'); console.log(envExists ? '✅ .env.local file exists' : '❌ .env.local file missing'); if(envExists){ const env = fs.readFileSync('.env.local', 'utf8'); const hasSupabase = env.includes('NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL') && env.includes('NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY'); console.log(hasSupabase ? '✅ Supabase environment variables found' : '❌ Supabase environment variables missing'); }"
scripts.eduardosaba: pnpm run format && pnpm run typecheck && echo 'Lint skipped - ESLint config issue' && pnpm run dependency-check && pnpm run env-check
